attributes.long-description:
Inspired by Disney/Pixar’s animated film, Cars 2: The Video Game lets you rev up your engine and join Lightning McQueen, Holly Shiftwell, Miles Axelrod and friends in a high-speed race around the globe. If you train hard enough, you might just make it as a special agent for C.H.R.O.M.E. (Command Headquarters for Recon Operations & Motorized Espionage) and get to tackle dangerous missions as an international spy. Use your daredevil driving skills in action-packed combat races and see if you can become the fastest car in the world!

Developed by Virtual Toys.

Cars 2 © 2011 Disney/Pixar not including the underlying rights for Third party vehicles; Volkswagen trademarks, design patents and copyrights are used with the approval of the owner Volkswagen AG; Gremlin is a trademark of Chrysler LLC; FIAT is a trademark of FIAT S.p.A.; Pacer is a trademark of Chrysler LLC;

Corvette is a trademark of General Motors; Jeep® and the Jeep® grille design are registered trademarks of Chrysler LLC; Sarge's rank insignia design used with the approval of the U.S. Army; Bentley is a trademark of Bentley Motors Limited; Maserati logos and model designations are trademarks of Maserati S.p.A. and are used under license; Background inspired by the Cadillac Ranch by Ant Farm (Lord, Michels and Marquez) © 1974.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Cars 2: The Video Game PSP®
